Uses of Interface
net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction

Packages that use EstimationFunction
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
Provides the implementation of Bernard Widrow and Ted Hoff's ADALINE (1960)
net.tvburger.jdl.knn
Provides the implementation of k-Nearest Neighbors
net.tvburger.jdl.linear
 
net.tvburger.jdl.mlp
Implementation of the MultiLayer Perceptron
net.tvburger.jdl.model
Defines the concepts for estimation functions
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
Defines the neural network as specialization of an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars
Defines scalar functions
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training
Defines the concepts related for training an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron
Provides the implementation of Frank Rosenblatt's Perceptron (1958)
